com.mygdx.game.model

Class HeroModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.model.ElementModel
      • com.mygdx.game.model.HeroModel

  • public class HeroModel
extends ElementModel
    HeroModel is a class that contains and deals with the information regarding the state of the hero, his health points, is mode of invincibility.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HeroModel.state

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HeroModel(float x, float y, int hp)
      Constructor of the class, it sets the state of the hero to jumping, his hp and the rest as false.

      • HeroModel

        public HeroModel(float x,
                 float y,
                 int hp)
        Constructor of the class, it sets the state of the hero to jumping, his hp and the rest as false.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the hero position
        y - y coordinate of the hero position
        hp - health points of the hero

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        If the hero is invincible, decreases the time of invincibility. If the time has run out, sets the flag invincibility to false, returning the hero to a state that can take damage.
        Parameters:
        delta - time interval

      • getInvincible

        public boolean getInvincible()
        Returns the flag invincible.
        Returns:
        value of the variable invincible

      • getHp

        public int getHp()
        Returns the hero's health points.
        Returns:
        value of the variable hp.

      • damage

        public boolean damage()
        If the hero is invincible, the hero doesn't take damage. If not, it decreases one in the hp variable and returns true if it is less or equal to 0, false if not.
        Returns:
        true if hp is less or equal to 0, false if not.
